alert.note: Alert for Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 13 at 1:09PM MST until January 14 at 10:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM FRIDAY TO 10 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Southwest wind 35 to 45 mph with gusts 60 to 70 mph along Wyoming Boulevard on the south side of Casper. Most of the lower elevations of Natrona County will see southwest wind 25 to 35 mph with gusts 40 to 50 mph. * WHERE...Natrona County Lower Elevations. * WHEN...From 10 PM Friday until 10 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Strong wind gusts will blow around loose objects. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest wind gusts will occur between 1 AM and 6 AM Saturday along Wyoming Boulevard between Casper Mountain Road and East 21st Street.
info.instruction: Be prepared for sudden strong wind gusts and cross winds if you are driving through the warned area.
